   <div class="row"> 
    <div class="col-md-8" id="mainPageContent"> 
     <div id="titleWithCountryHeading"> 
      <h1 class="salary-title-heading"> Software Developer with JavaScript Skills in Charlotte, North Carolina Salary </h1> 
     </div> 
     <p>A Software Developer with JavaScript skills in Charlotte, North Carolina earns an average salary of $72,463 per year. Most people with this job move on to other positions after 10 years in this field.</p> 
     <div class="panel panel-default"> 
      <div class="panel-body"> 
       <!--Bootstrap 3 Modal Dialog - Survey Start --> 
       <div class="yearly"> 
        <div id="m_literalDiv" class="payRange">
          $55,973 - $97,029 
        </div> 
        <div class="bottom_dashed payOverTimeDashed" style="min-height: 9px; margin-bottom: 3px;"></div> 
        <div class="results-salary"> 
         <div class="clip-children"> 
          <div class="ticklines-header"> 
           <div class="clear" style="min-height: 5px;"> 
           </div> 
           <div class="head-block"> 
            <div class="tickheader"> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 0.00%"> 
             </div> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 46.9183989084315%; display:"> 
              <div class="ticker_text ">
                $56K 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 57.1492996298827%; display:"> 
              <div class="ticker_text  hidden-xs">
                $62K 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 67.0720508164463%; display:"> 
              <div class="ticker_text ">
                $78K 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 79.7630678706778%; display:"> 
              <div class="ticker_text  hidden-xs">
                $86K 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="ticker" style="left: 90%; display:"> 
              <div class="ticker_text ">
                $97K 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="clear" style="min-height: 54px;"> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="results-table"> 
           <div class="linepane"> 
            <div class="line" style="left: 0%"> 
            </div> 
            <div class="whiteline" style="left: 67.0720508164463%"> 
            </div> 
            <div class="you_star_container" style="left: 67.0720508164463%;"> 
             <div class="you_star"> 
              <svg width="19" height="19" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> 
               <circle stroke="null" id="svg_1" fill="#fff" cx="9.375" cy="9.625" r="9.625" /> 
               <path stroke="#fff" id="svg_2" fill="#feca00" d="m1.07582,8.29397l6.03712,-1.20638l0.85429,-6.87278l2.87675,6.12709l6.03702,-1.20638l-4.25911,4.99316l2.87694,6.12709l-5.50914,-3.0412l-4.25911,4.99326l0.85438,-6.87278l-5.50914,-3.04109z" /> 
              </svg> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="you_label_arrow" style="left: 67.0720508164463%;"> 
             <div class="you_label_arrow_triangle"></div> 
             <div class="you_label" style="left: -50%;">
               MEDIAN:&nbsp;$77,701 
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div> 
            <div class="stripe"> 
             <div class="salary-info">

        <p class="small" id="divAddChart"> Add this chart to your site: <a href="javascript:void(0);" rel="nofollow" class="small syndicateTotalPayLinkLarge"> <img width="16" height="16" border="0" style="vertical-align: bottom;" alt="" src="/images/embedicon.png"> 640px </a>&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="javascript:void(0);" rel="nofollow" class="small syndicateTotalPayLinkSmall"> <img width="16" height="16" border="0" style="vertical-align: bottom;" alt="" src="/images/embedicon.png"> 300px </a> <span style="display: none;" class="small togglableCopyText">&nbsp;Copy and paste this HTML:</span><br> <span style="display: none;" class="togglableCopyText"> <input onclick="this.select()" id="syndicateTotalPayChart" value="" class="form-control syndicateTotalPayChartInput"> </span> </p> 
       </div> 
       <div class="hourly"> 
       </div> 
       <div class="rc-nav-buttons"> 
        <div class="dropdown btn-group margin-small"> 
         <button class="btn dropdown-toggle btn-primary" type="button" id="citySideNavLink" data-toggle="dropdown"> city </button> 
         <ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu" aria-labelledby="citySideNavLink"> 
          <li role="presentation"> <a role="menuitem" href="/research/US/Job=Software_Developer/Salary/08b271f4/Raleigh-NC-JavaScript"> Raleigh </a> </li> 
          <li class="divider"></li>

     <div id="pinned-survey-start-PinnedSurveyStartMobile"></div> 
     <div class="panel panel-default  "> 
      <div class="panel-heading"> 
       <h3 class="panel-title">About Charlotte, North Carolina</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="panel-body"> 
       <div class="about-city"> 
        <div class="row margin-bottom"> 
         <div class="col-md-6 margin-bottom"> 
          <img src="https://cdn-payscale.com/content/wikipedia/commons/c/c1/Charlotte_collage.jpg" class="img-responsive"> 
         </div> 
         <div class="col-md-6"> 
          <div class="row"> 
           <div class="col-sm-6 margin-bottom-lg"> 
            <div>
             <label>County, State</label>
            </div> 
            <div>
             Mecklenburg County, North Carolina
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="col-sm-6 margin-bottom-lg"> 
            <div>
             <label>Population</label>
            </div> 
            <div>
             827,121
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="row"> 
           <div class="col-md-12"> 
            <div>
             <label>Gender</label>
            </div> 
            <div> 
             <table> 
              <colgroup>
               <col style="width:0%"> 
               <col style="width:100%"> 
               <col style="width:0%"> 
              </colgroup>
              <tbody>
               <tr> 
                <td>Male:</td> 
                <td class="progress-cell"> 
                 <div class="progress"> 
                  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-top" role="progressbar" style="width: 48.0%"></div> 
                 </div> </td> 
                <td>
                 <div class="text-nowrap">
                  396,646 (48.0%)
                 </div></td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td>Female:</td> 
                <td class="progress-cell"> 
                 <div class="progress"> 
                  <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" style="width: 52.0%"></div> 
                 </div> </td> 
                <td>
                 <div class="text-nowrap">
                  430,475 (52.0%)
                 </div></td> 
               </tr> 
              </tbody>
             </table> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <div class="row margin-bottom"> 
         <div class="col-md-12"> 
          <div>
           Charlotte /????rl?t/ is the largest city in the state of North Carolina. It is the county seat of Mecklenburg County and the second largest city in the southeastern United States, just behind Jacksonville, Florida. Charlotte is the third fastest growing major city in the United States. In 2014, the estimated population of Charlotte according to the U.S.&nbsp;Census Bureau was 809,958, making it the 17th largest city in the United States based on population. The Charlotte metropolitan area ranks 22nd largest in the US and had a 2014 population of 2,380,314. The Charlotte metropolitan area is part of a sixteen-county market region or combined statistical area with a 2014 U.S.&nbsp;Census population estimate of 2,537,990. Residents of Charlotte are referred to as "Charlotteans." It is listed as a "gamma-plus" global city by the Globalization and World Cities Research Network. Charlotte is home to the corporate headquarters of Bank of America and the east...
          </div> 
          <div>
           <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlotte,_North_Carolina" rel="nofollow">Read more from Wikipedia&nbsp;»</a>
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <div class="row"> 
         <div class="col-md-6"> 
          <div class="row"> 
           <div class="col-md-12 margin-bottom-lg"> 
            <div>
             <label>Median Household Income (2015)</label>
            </div> 
            <div> 
             <table> 
              <colgroup>

                <td>

                  Charlotte:
                 </div></td>

                 <div class="progress"> 
                  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-top" role="progressbar" style="width: 53%"></div> 
                 </div> </td> 
                <td>
                 <div>
                  $53,919
                 </div></td> 
               </tr> 
               <tr> 
                <td>
                 <div class="text-nowrap">

                 </div></td>

                 </div> </td>

                 <div>
                  $47,830
                 </div></td> 
               </tr> 
              </tbody>
             </table> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="col-md-12 margin-bottom-lg"> 
            <div>
             <label>Median Gross Rent (2015)</label>

            <div>

            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <div class="col-md-6"> 
          <div class="row">

                 </div></td>

            </div> 
           </div>

         <div class="col-md-12"> 
          <div class="small">

      <div class="panel-heading">

     <div id="RCSearchBrowse" style="bottom: 0;" class="text-left margin-bottom"> 
      <a href="/index/US">Browse Other Categories</a> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="col-md-4" id="sideBarContent"> 
     <span id="rc_edu_span5ad"> 
      <div class="center-block text-center">
       <div id="div-gpt-ad-payscale-PayScale_RC_Monster_Right-Column_300x250" style="width: 300px; height: 250px" class="center-block">
        <script type="text/javascript">googletag.cmd.push(function () { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-payscale-PayScale_RC_Monster_Right-Column_300x250'); });</script>
       </div>
       <h5>ADVERTISEMENT</h5>
      </div> </span> 
     <div id="pinned-survey-start-PinnedSurveyStartDesktop"></div>

  <script>
        
    window.pageType = 1;
    
        ps_reporting_count = 39;
        ps_jobtitle = "Software Developer";
    
        window.PoptopPropData = '{"trackingCode":{"source":"ps","section":"rc","detail":"job"},"id":"rcPoptop","className":""}';
    
     g_payOverTimeJs = {"largeHourly":"&lt;div style=&quot;width:628px; border: 1px solid #cecece; font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;; padding:10px 0 10px 10px;&quot;&gt;&lt;div style=&quot;font-size:20px; text-align: center;&quot;&gt;&lt;a style=&quot;text-decoration: none; color:#0066cc;&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;https://www.payscale.com/research/US/Job=Software_Developer/Salary/c437652c/Charlotte-NC-JavaScript&quot;
